column2: glm.bbbc <- glm(Choice ~ . -First_purchase - Observation, data = bbc_train, family = binomial)

glm(formula = Choice ~ . - First_purchase - Observation, family = binomial, 
    data = bbc_train)
Null deviance: 1799.5  on 1599  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 1393.5  on 1590  degrees of freedom
glm.step.bbc = step(glm.bbbc, direction = "backward") # stepwise backward elim.

glm(formula = Choice ~ (Observation + Gender + Amount_purchased + 
    Frequency + Last_purchase + First_purchase + P_Child + P_Youth + 
    P_Cook + P_DIY + P_Art) - First_purchase - Observation, family = binomial, 
    data = bbc_train)
Null deviance: 1799.5  on 1599  degrees of freedom
Residual deviance: 1393.5  on 1590  degrees of freedom
